apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji, featuring a couple with medium-dark and medium-light skin tones on Apple devices, showcases a tender embrace with a radiant heart floating between them. Apple's signature soft rounded edges and gentle, realistic lighting give the figures a warm, approachable feel, while the heart glows with a warm, affectionate hue. It beautifully symbolizes love, partnership, and deep connection between two individuals.
